member.name: M:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.ObjectIdOrNull(IdmNet.Models.IdmResource)
member.summary: Returns the ObjectID of the resource or NULL if the resource value is null
member.param: The IdmResource
member.returns: The resource's ObjectID or null if the resource itself is null

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.Attributes
member.summary: List of attributes for which we have data for this particular object. Note that due to performance reasons, there may be other attributes and values in the identity manager service, but they may not have been retrieved yet.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.ObjectID
member.summary: (aka Resource ID) The value of the attribute is a globally unique identifier (GUID) assigned by FIM to each resource when it is created. Note that it is not required here since this class also represents resources that may not have been created as well as existing resources.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.ObjectType
member.summary: (aka Resource Type) The resource type of a resource. This attribute is assigned its value when the resource is created in the FIM service database by the FIM service. It cannot be modified by any user.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.CreatedTime
member.summary: (aka Created Time) The time when the resource is created in the FIM service database. This attribute is assigned its value by the FIM service. It cannot be modified by any user.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.Creator
member.summary: This is a reference attribute that refers to the resource that directly created the resource in the FIM service database. This attribute is assigned its value by the FIM service. It cannot be modified by any user.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.DeletedTime
member.summary: (aka Deleted Time) The time when the current resource is deleted from the FIM service database. This attribute is assigned its value by the FIM service. It cannot be modified by any user.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.Description
member.summary: Resource Description

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.DetectedRulesList
member.summary: (aka Detected Rules List) The synchronization rules detected for resources in external systems.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.DisplayName
member.summary: (aka Display Name) Display name for the resource.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.ExpectedRulesList
member.summary: (aka Expected Rules List) This resource has been added to these Synchronization Rules and will be manifested in external systems according to the Synchronization Rule definitions.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.ExpirationTime
member.summary: (aka Expiration Time) The date and time when the resource expires. The appropriate Management Policy Rule will delete the resource when the current date and time is later than the date and time specified in this attribute.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.Locale
member.summary: The region and language for which the representation of a resource has been adapted.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.MVObjectID
member.summary: (aka MV Resource ID) The GUID of an entry in the FIM metaverse corresponding to this resource.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.ResourceTime
member.summary: (aka Resource Time) The date and time of a representation of a resource. This attribute is updated by the FIM service. This attribute can be used to define time triggered Management Policy Rules.

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmResource.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Resource Indexer - get's the attribute of the resource object as indexed by name.
member.param: Index by attribute name

member.name: T:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute
member.summary: Represents an individual Identity Manager resource's attribute and value

member.name: M:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Parameterless Constructor

member.name: M:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.ToBool
member.summary: Convert the Value (string) of an attribute to boolean, if the attribute is defined as a boolean in Identity Manager
member.returns: Boolean value of the attribute or null if the attribute is "not present" in the Identity Manager resource (and booleans may not be multi-valued attributes in Identity Manager)

member.name: M:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.ToDateTime
member.summary: Convert the Value (string) of an attribute to DateTime, if the attribute is defined as a DateTime object in Identity Manager
member.returns: Single (or first) DateTime value of the attribute or null if the attribute is "not present" in the Identity Manager resource

member.name: M:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.ToDateTimes
member.summary: Convert the Values (strings) of an multi-valued attribute to DateTime, if the attribute is defined as a DateTime in Identity Manager
member.returns: List of DateTime values of the attribute or null if the attribute is "not present" in the Identity Manager resource

member.name: M:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.ToBinary
member.summary: Convert the Value (string) of an attribute to a binary value (byte[]), if the attribute is defined as binary in Identity Manager
member.returns: Single (or first) binary value of the attribute or null if the attribute is "not present" in the Identity Manager resource

member.name: M:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.ToBinaries
member.summary: Convert the Values (strings) of an multi-valued attribute to binary, if the attribute is defined as Binary in Identity Manager
member.returns: List of binary values of the attribute or null if the attribute is "not present" in the Identity Manager resource

member.name: M:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.ToInteger
member.summary: Convert the Value (string) of an attribute to a integer value if the attribute is defined as such in Identity Manager
member.returns: Single (or first) integer value of the attribute or null if there are no values for the attribute

member.name: M:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.ToIntegers
member.summary: Convert the Values (strings) of an multi-valued attribute to integers, if the attribute is defined as integer in Identity Manager
member.returns: List of integer values of the attribute or null if the attribute is "not present" in the Identity Manager resource

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.Name
member.summary: Attribute name

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.Values
member.summary: List of values for this attribute

member.name: P:IdmNet.Models.IdmAttribute.Value
member.summary: Makes the native multi-valued nature of the Attribute look like a single-valued attribute

member.name: T:IdmNet.IdmNetClient
member.summary: This is the primary class in the IdmNet assembly. It is the .NET client used to perform CRUD operations on objects/resources in the Identity Manager Service database.

member.name: M:IdmNet.IdmNetClient.#ctor(SearchClient,ResourceFactoryClient,ResourceClient)
member.summary: Primary constructor for the IdmNetClient. Though this is public and can be called, the normal thing to do is to use IdmNetClientFactory.BuildClient(). This is available in case you want to build the client based on different assumptions made by the factory builder. For example, if you wanted to use a different client credentials mechanism, WCF binding, or endpoints
member.param: This is the SOAP client used to connect to Identity Manager for search functionality (WS-Enumeration - Enumerate and Pull operations)
This is the SOAP client used to create new objects/resources in Identity Manager (WS-Transfer - Create operation)
This is the SOAP client used to modify existing objects/resources in Identity Manager

member.name: M:IdmNet.IdmNetClient.SearchAsync(IdmNet.SearchCriteria)
member.summary: Search the Identity Manager (async await)

member.name: M:IdmNet.IdmNetClient.PostAsync(IdmNet.Models.IdmResource)
member.summary: Create Object/Resource in Identity Manager Service (async await)
member.param: Resource to be created
member.returns: Resource with its newly assigned ObjectID

member.name: M:IdmNet.IdmNetClient.DeleteAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Delete an object in the Identity Manager service (async await)
member.param: Resource ID for the object to be deleted

member.name: M:IdmNet.IdmNetClient.AddValueAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a value to a multi-valued attribute in the Identity Manager service (async await)
member.remarks: While all attributes in an IdmResource are technically multi-valued, this method only works on attributes that are marked as multi-valued in the Identity Manager service.
member.param: Resource ID for the object containing the multi-valued attribute
Name of the Multi-Valued attribute to which a value will be added
Value to be added to the Multi-Valued attribute
member.returns: Task (async/await) of the asynchronous operation

member.name: M:IdmNet.IdmNetClient.RemoveValueAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Remove a value from a multi-valued attribute in the Identity Manager service (async await)
member.remarks: While all attributes in an IdmResource are technically multi-valued, this method only works on attributes that are marked as multi-valued in the Identity Manager service.
member.param: Resource ID for the object containing the multi-valued attribute
Name of the Multi-Valued attribute from which a value will be removed
Value to be removed from the Multi-Valued attribute
member.returns: Task (async/await) of the asynchronous operation

member.name: M:IdmNet.IdmNetClient.ReplaceValueAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replace/Set the value for a single-valued attribute in the Identity Manager service (async await)
member.remarks: While all attributes in an IdmResource are technically multi-valued, this method only works on attributes that are marked as single-valued in the Identity Manager service.
member.param: Resource ID for the object containing the single-valued attribute
Name of the Single-Valued attribute which will have its value set/replaced
Value to be set for the Single-Valued attribute
member.returns: Task (async/await) of the asynchronous operation

member.name: M:IdmNet.IdmNetClient.ChangeMultipleAttrbutes(System.String,IdmNet.SoapModels.Change[])
member.summary: Make multiple changes to a particular Identity Manager service object/resource (async await)
member.param: Resource ID for the object containing the attributes to be modified
Set of changes (Multi-valued "Adds/Removes and Single-valued "Replaces" to be made for the single object
member.returns: Task (async/await) of the asynchronous operation
